page.title: 05Norwell & Cromwell's Traffic
page.content: The area is very much one of contrast; quiet country lanes cover most of the block but on the eastern edge is the busy{A1 Trunk Road.}We decided to do a survey to see how much traffic actually uses our roads. It was on Wednesday, October 23rd from 1330-1430, which is market day in nearby Newark. (1) {Main Street,Norwell. Cars.......30 Buses.......2 Vans.......19 Cycles......1 Lorries.....3 Motorbikes..1 Horses......2 (2){ A1 at Cromwell. Cars.....1207 Vans......140 Lorries...606 Motorbikes..5 Buses.......3 Tractors....2 These results show that{Norwell,}the largest village, had{58}vehicles whereas at the same time on the{A1 there were{1963}vehicles.
